question:
[Kenneth] went to lunch with his wife [Valerie]. [Darryl] and his sister, [Elizabeth] love it when their grandmother visits because she spoils them. She is coming this week to watch them while their parents are out of town. [Elizabeth] took her sister, [Brittney], out to dinner for her birthday. [Debra] took her grandson, [Darryl], to see his dad, [Kenneth]. [Darryl] stayed up late on the weekend listening to stories of his grandfather [Kevin]'s youth. [Elizabeth] bought her mother, [Valerie], a puppy for her birthday. [Elizabeth] wanted to visit an art museum, so she asked her father, [Kenneth] to take her. [Kenneth] and [Harry] were both still very upset with their mother, [Debra].
Question: How is [Kevin] related to [Brittney]?

- Based on the information provided, Kevin is the father of Debra, who is the mother of Darryl and Elizabeth. Since Brittney is the sister of Darryl and Elizabeth, it can be inferred that Kevin is the grandfather of Brittney.

Step 4: Summarize the relationship:
- Kevin is the grandfather of Brittney.

By following these steps, you can analyze the relationships between the family members and infer the relationship between Kevin and Brittney.
